name: The Breakout (lukebandy)
description:
The Breakout

Someone has been falsely imprisoned, and it is your job to break them out. The only evidence? Their scream.

Search the prison for the target, then return them to your cell where you can escape through the secret tunnel. Scream at prisoners to make them scream back. Watch out for the guards, who will hunt any escapees down or investigate any nearby screams or the noise of a cell being opened.

Created as part of Global Game Jam 2021

PC Controls

WASD to move

Left/Right to rotate the camera

Space to scream and to start the game

E to open cell doors

Controller Controls

Controller recommended.

Left stick to move

Right stick to rotate the camera

B/Circle to scream and to start the game

A/X to open cell doors
